title: Create a Data Dictionary
description: To ensure consistent reporting, an analyst needs to create a data dictionary that defines each key metric the team uses.

tasks.description: List all the primary metrics used in team reporting (e.g., CTR, CPC, CPL, ROAS).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a comprehensive list of metrics.

tasks.description: For each metric, write a clear, unambiguous definition.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent defines each metric (e.g., 'CTR = Clicks / Impressions').

tasks.description: For each metric, specify the source of truth (e.g., 'Data from Google Ads platform').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clarifies where the data for each metric comes from.

tasks.description: Create a shared document with this information to serve as the team's data dictionary.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a central reference document for the team.
